scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && node ./src/bin/www
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && nodemon ./src/bin/www
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/test --forceExit --coverage
